title: Wheels Manufacturing Solo-Spline: Single Speed for Micro-Spline Hubs
content:
If you have Micro-Spline hubs and want to run single-speed, check out the new Solo-Spline setup from Wheels Manufacturing. Following the success of our Solo-XD kit, the Solo-Spline offers an easy and affordable way to convert your existing Shimano wheels into a robust single-speed setup. Ideal for commuters, racers, and trail enthusiasts, the Solo-Spline makes it easyâ€¦

The Solo-Spline features a unique design that incorporates a base sleeve and lockring which smoothly fits onto the Shimano Micro Spline compatible freehub body. This mirrors the hassle-free installation of a standard cassette, allowing for quick setup changes. Slide on the spacers and cog, and secure them with a dependable lock ring. Experience the perfect ride, tailored to your preferences and riding style.

Key Features of the SOLO-SPLINE:

Precision Engineering: Utilizes a durable 7075 Aluminum carrier and cogs, with lightweight 6061 Aluminum spacers.

Adjustable Setup: Includes adjustable spacers to fine-tune your chainline for optimal performance.

Compatibility: Designed specifically for Shimano Micro Spline compatible hub bodies. Enhanced Chain Retention: Features a cog designed with a narrow-wide tooth pattern to ensure superior chain hold.

Customizable Options: Available cog sizes include 16T, 18T, and 20T, allowing you to customize your ride.

Lightweight Design: At only 115g, the kit is lighter than many other options on the market, reducing rotational mass for faster acceleration and easier climbing.

Included in the Kit:

  • 1 Lock Ring (6061 Aluminum)
  • 1 Carrier Ring (7075 Aluminum)
  • 1 End Spacer (6061 Aluminum)
  • 1 5mm Spacer (6061 Aluminum)
  • 2 2mm Spacers (6061 Aluminum)
  • 1 1mm Spacer (6061 Aluminum)
  • 1 18T Cog (7075 Aluminum)

See more at Wheels Manufacturing.
